query:
SELECT g.*, p.name as player_name, t.name as team_name, c.slug
FROM goals g
JOIN players p ON g.playerId = p.id
JOIN teams t ON p.teamId = t.id
JOIN campaigns c ON t.campaignId = c.id
WHERE c.slug = 'besta';
